Posts.Content: Insurance companies are trying to make mastectomy an outpatient procedure. Mastectomy can be very painful and women need time to recover in the hospital for 24-48 hours to limit infection and to get proper pain control. Please consider signing the petition at the link below. Mastectomy should not be a drive through procedure. http://www.lifetimetv.com/reallife/b...st_pledge.html Thanks! Isidella
Posts.Title: Please help!
